name: Roller Coaster Simulator 2 - Extreme Adventure Roller Coaster Madness 2016
name_original: Roller Coaster Simulator 2 - Extreme Adventure Roller Coaster Madness 2016
description:
RollerCoaster Simulator 2 2016 is adventure roller coaster game of 2016.
-This is the latest version of the earlier roller coaster game. This game includes various new and latest
features prior to the earlier game.
Your task is to entertain people who came to enjoy your roller coaster ride. But keep one thing in mind that
the roller coaster will fall off if the speed is too high and if the speed is low than the people will not
enjoy the ride.
So earn more points by keeping the people happy.

Feature:
-) Amazing environment and realistic 3D Graphics
-) Great gameplay of each rides
-) Many rides to unlock
-) Light weight and easy user interface

So download this great and latest roller coaster 2016 game
